title.rendered: How Victoria’s Secret Angels Get Their Bodies

content.rendered:
Well, it’s that time of year again for that one top-model-in-lingerie event that the media blowsss up- The Victoria’s Secret Fashion Show!! As this video is opinion based, it also has lots of facts and direct quotes taken from the angels themselves or their trainers.
I wanted to give the two different perspectives on how this fashion show is seen, and why it can be positively AND negatively impacting.
Let me know what you guys think!!
